author: Louise Radnofsky
title: Trump Administration Tells Idaho It Will Enforce Affordable Care Act if State Refuses
text:
WASHINGTON—The Trump administration will step in to enforce the Affordable Care Act’s requirements in Idaho if the state doesn’t back down on its plan to allow the sale of skimpier, less expensive insurance products, a top health official told Idaho on Thursday.
“We sincerely appreciate your dedication to the people of ldaho and your efforts to address the damage caused by the PPACA,” wrote Seema Verma, the administrator of the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services. Her agency oversees implementation of the 2010 health...
